message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $700,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand you have budget considerations, but $700,000 is significantly below the product's market value and what it offers your business.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is a competitive offer, reflecting the true value of this product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counterpropose a price of $850,000.
